Plot Outline

Up-and-coming sports reporter (Hartnett) rescues
a homeless man (Champ, Jackson) only to
discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend
believed to have passed away.What begins as an
opportunity to resurrect Champs story and
escape the shadow of his fathers success becomes
a personal journey as the ambitious reporter
reexamines his own life and his relationship
with his family.
